<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Encode the displacement part of pc-relative memri34, which is an imm34.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The 34 bit immediate can fall into one of three cases:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) It is a relocation to be filled in by the linker represented as:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    (MCExpr::SymbolRef)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) It is a relocation + SignedOffset represented as:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    (MCExpr::Binary(MCExpr::SymbolRef + MCExpr::Constant))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3) It is a known value at compile time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is not a MCExpr then we are in case 3) and we are dealing with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a value known at compile time, not a relocation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(OpNo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
